attributes.action: cat control during birds nesting season.
attributes.additional_details:
IN LIGHT OF COMMON BIRDS NUMBERS
DANGEROUSLY DECLINED,I WOULD LIKE
THE GOVERMENT TO HAVE PET CATS MOVEMENTS RESTRICTED TO THEIR
OWNERS PROPERTY ONLY,BETWEEN THE MONTHS OF APRIL TO AUGUST,THE MAIN
NESTING AND FLEDGLING TIMES
THIS WOULD HAVE  A DRAMATIC AND
BENEFICIAL EFFECT ON BIRDS SAFETY
AND REPRODUCTION.
